net.floodlightcontroller.core.web.serializers

Class StatsReplySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
      • net.floodlightcontroller.core.web.serializers.StatsReplySerializer

  • public class StatsReplySerializer
extends
    Serialize any OFStatsReply or OFFeaturesReply in JSON wrapped by a StatsReply object. Use automatically by Jackson via JsonSerialize(using=StatsReplySerializer.class), or use the static functions within this class to serializer a specific OFStatType within another serializer.
